Partly cloudy skies PERIOD Low 44F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



To the girl who sits in front of me who never shuts up is your ass jealous of the s that comes out of your mouth

If you are referring to the girl who is forever singing something on the minges bus she is down with a date PERIOD

If I see another guy in basketball shorts in thirtydegree weather I am going to lose it PERIOD We get it youre straight PERIOD

To the only considerate guy who gave his seat up yesterday afternoon on the packed NCC bus so my broken foot and I could have a seat THANK YOU 

I secretly hate all of my girlfriends friends PERIOD I finally meet this girl and then all of sudden theres six other girls...SCRAM

Graduated in May with a . pERIOD Now making  a year PERIOD Snake it till you make it PERIOD

Every time I hear the term  I automatically want to go f someone PERIOD

To the Econ Grad who spilled coffee on himself while I was on my lunch break I wish you would have asked for my number PERIOD

I love the Australian flag hanging from White.. PERIOD Now if only I could find out who lives in that room PERIOD 

The Pirate Tutoring Center should not be allowed to hire such hot tutors PERIOD Hot tutor  math homework PERIOD I think I know whom Id rather do PERIOD

Attention everyone who doesnt pick up his or her dog s Start picking up your dog s PERIOD

People get so touchy about teachers PERIOD Most of them are some of the dumbest people Ive encountered minus a few gems and brilliant professors PERIOD

Can the  ECU football schedule come out already Im getting married in less than eight months and need to pick the time PERIOD

Shout out to the two guys in the Bate line that convinced me to try the hot n spicy Cheezits PERIOD They are good PERIOD

That moment when youre seriously considering prostitution to pay for college PERIOD

Campus is like one giant closet PERIOD Its  dudes totally okay to come out now PERIOD Plus surprise most of your friends and family already know you arent straight PERIOD GET WITH IT PERIOD

Still havent figured out what sorority OBX is PERIOD I see their shirts everywhere on campus PERIOD

Ive had balls in my face that smell better than the jerseys in gym class PERIOD

What is the point of Safe Ride if it is neither safe nor do they provide rides when you need it

Just want to say thanks to all the professors who got together this semester to plan to have all their exams on the same day PERIOD Sincerely The Angry Student

Why is it that when guys are done thats the end of sex what if Im not done
